channel.title: CVE Feed for Wordpress Simple Shop -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Wordpress Simple Shop -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-38340|2024-08-04T01:37:16.517Z -- wordpress%20simple%20shop -- wordpress%20simple%20shop
item.description: The Wordpress Simple Shop WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the update_row parameter found in the ~/includes/add_product.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 1.2.
